mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into task (`type`, info_id, execution_datetime, `status`, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executionDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update task set `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execution_datetime = #{executionDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_by = #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `type`, info_id, execution_datetime, `status`, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from task where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
